headline: Eversource Energy (ES): Valuation Insights After Analyst Upgrades Highlight Dividend Strength
summary: Eversource Energy (ES) shares saw some upside following recognition from major analysts, with both BofA and Goldman Sachs highlighting the company for its track record of consistent and growing dividends in the utilities sector. Investors seem to be taking notice of this renewed confidence from Wall Street, especially as stable dividend payers gain attention. See our latest analysis for Eversource Energy. Beyond analyst attention, Eversource Energy has kept up its momentum with a 1-month...

headline: Jeffries Raises Price Target for Eversource Energy (ES)
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) operates New England’s largest energy delivery system and serves customers in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. On October 22, Jefferies analyst Paul Zimbardo raised the price target for Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) from $54 to $60 and maintained […]
